definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: Since heartbreaking is inevitable, why should I be head over heels in love?
sentences.chinese: 明知道傷心總是難免，爲何我還要一往情深。

sentences.english: She could hate as passionately as she could love.
sentences.chinese: 她能恨得咬牙切齒，也能愛得一往情深。

sentences.english: But why it is so devotedly attached to it a long time?
sentences.chinese: 但是爲何對久卻是這樣一往情深呢？

sentences.english: China was, he confessed, an addiction with him.
sentences.chinese: 他坦承，對中國一往情深。

sentences.english: Everybody saw her fling herself at your head.
sentences.chinese: 大家都看到她一往情深地戀着你。

sentences.english: My recalling is filled with your deep love.
2：I've been going with Susan for three years and I'm crazy about her!
sentences.chinese: 我和蘇珊已經約會了三年了，我對她一往情深。

definition: to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant

pinyin: ai4 de5 si3 qu4 huo2 lai2

definition: lit. the falling flowers are yearning for love, but the heartless brook ripples on (idiom)/fig. one side is willing, yet the other one remains indifferent (usually of unrequited love)
pinyin: luo4 hua1 you3 yi4 , liu2 shui3 wu2 qing2

definition: tender and soft as water/deeply attached to sb
